effect.shortEffect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.
effect.full: Moves used by or against this Pokémon never miss. One-hit KO moves are unaffected. Moves affected by this ability can hit Pokémon during the preparation turn of moves like dig or fly. Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is doubled.

description.diamond-pearl: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.
description.platinum: Ensures the Pokémon and its foe’s attacks land.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Ensures both Pokémon’s and foe’s attacks land.
description.black-white: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
description.black-2-white-2: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
description.x-y: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Ensures that attacks by or against the Pokémon will land.
description.sun-moon: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
description.sword-shield: The Pokémon employs no-guard tactics to ensure incoming and outgoing attacks always land.
